<title level="1" right="Rules">[Skill Feats](/Rules.aspx?ID=1919)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 159 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
When using this variant, consider allowing the [Quick Setup](/Feats.aspx?ID=4085) skill feat to enable characters to Craft exceptionally low-level items even more quickly. This skill feat is listed as [rare](/Traits.aspx?ID=137) and is never available to a character except when using this variant. This rapid form of crafting could cause your players to end up with higher treasure values or more items than an adventure expects them to have, so be careful about allowing this feat in campaigns that already provide significant amounts of downtime.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
